files.patch:
@@ -40,4 +40,0 @@
-# Force early generation of module-deps.gmk
-GENERATE_MODULE_DEPS_FILE := true
-include Modules.gmk
-

@@ -45,0 +45,6 @@
+
+ifneq ($(NO_RECIPES), )
+  # If we are being called in a preparatory mode, update module-deps.gmk
+  GENERATE_MODULE_DEPS_FILE := true
+endif
+
